research experience.name: Unbounded AI Lab, University of Central Florida
research experience.summary: Working under Prof. Qian Lou on efficient and scalable AI systems.
highlights: Exploring system-level optimizations for large language models.
Focusing on efficiency and scalability in AI deployment.

research experience.name: Undergraduate Research
research experience.summary: Worked on Bangla NLP projects, including emotion detection and multimodal sentiment analysis.
highlights: Published findings at IEEE ICCIT 2023, and EMNLP 2023 (BLP Workshop).

industrial experience.name: Kinetik Healthcare Solutions
industrial experience.summary: Worked as a full-time software engineer for a U.S.-based startup, contributing to an Uber-like app for medical transportation as one of the three core members of the iOS team.
highlights: Developed the iOS mobile application from scratch
Designed the frontend with Swift, UIKit.
Implemented the backend with NodeJs, gRPC, MongoDB, TypeScript, NestJs

industrial experience.name: AppsCode Inc.
industrial experience.summary: Undertook this internship as part of my undergraduate curriculum, gaining hands-on industry experience while fulfilling course credit requirements.
highlights: Developed and integrated RESTful API endpoints using Go.

teaching experience.name: Chittagong University of Engineering and Technology
teaching experience.summary: Served as a judge and problem setter for multiple divisional and national inter-university programming competitions. Authored and reviewed problems, coordinated problem sets, and ensured contest quality across events.
highlights: CUET CodeStorm 1.0 - Inter University Programming Contest 2024.
CUET CSE Fest - Inter University Programming Contest 2022.

teaching experience.name: International Islamic University Chittagong
teaching experience.summary: Served as a trainer, using my competitive programming background to prepare IIUC teams for the International Collegiate Programming Contest.
highlights: Conducted over 20 training sessions on Algorithms and Data Structures for a group of 100+ students.
Reformed and coached teams that went on to secure 2nd and 3rd place in two inter-university programming contests.

teaching experience.name: Chittagong University of Engineering and Technology
teaching experience.summary: Appointed as a TA for the "Structured Programming" course under Assistant Professor Md. Sabir Hossain.
highlights: Provided one-on-one guidance to enhance students' foundational knowledge.

projects.title: Real-Time Expression Detector
description: Built a body language decoder to detect expression in real-time from live videos using machine learning algorithms in Python.
Captured coordinates of facial expressions and gestures
Detected happy, sad, and victory expressions with an average accuracy of 94%

projects.title: FameBiz
description: This was a team project, we developed a platform to connect fans with their favorite celebrities.
I implemented the backend of this project using TypeScript, NestJS, MongoDB, and REST API.

highlights: Arranged workshops, seminars & contests on regular basis.
Created annual curriculum and programming syllabus for the club members.
